✿ ABOUT THIS GAME

'Successor of the Moon' is a 2D side-scrolling action (Metroidvania) game.

After receiving reports about monsters' suspicious movements in Parthenope, the young priestess Stella embarks on a journey to resolve them.

Areas to explore: Forest, Snow field, Volcano, Underground

Seek the help of peers and elves.
Acquire various abilities.
Find out the truth about Stella's journey.

Features

    - Varying difficulties are available depending on a player's preferences- More than 100 areas to explore- 5 challenging and dynamic boss battles- Use the Moon Wheel to create special combos- More than 15 types of different item effects- Magical crystals hidden within secret areas
